text: ghalabt fars alrwm fi 'adnaa 'ard "alsham" 'iilaa "fars", wasawf yaghlib alrwm alfrs fi mdt min alzmn, la tazid ealaa eshr sanawat wala tanqus ean thlath. lilah subhanah wteala al'amr kuluh qabl aintisar alruwm wbedh, wayawm yntsr alruwm ealaa alfrs yafrah almuminun binasr allah llrwm ealaa alfrs. wallah subhanah wteala yansur man ysha', wykhdhl min ysha', wahu aleaziz aldhy la yghalab, alrahim biman sha' min khlqh. waqad tuhaqiq dhlk fghalabat alrwm alfrs baed sbe snyn, wfrh almuslimun bdhlk; lkwn alruwm 'ahl kitab wa'iin hrrafwh
